sy: Londoners love a good pub and we've got the best here for you. Enjoy top notch roast dinners, including yorkshire puddings the size of your face, at The Pig & Buthcher, The Easton or The Copper Cow. Or if you fancy something a bit different grab a pizza at The Crate Brewery, which brews its own beer, or indulge in Italian tapas at hip The Ape & Bird. It's what Sunday afternoons were made for!
